ygData.subject: Tinkering...??
ygData.msgSnippet: hi,my name is agedon and i am a lvl 15 necromancer of akkon; i am very close to the 16 and real hot to get the tinkering skill.....but there is one
ygData.messageBody:
hi,my name is agedon and i am a lvl 15 necromancer of akkon;
i am very close to the 16 and real hot to get the tinkering skill.....but
there is one problem...is there anybody who can explain me, how the
tinkering skill works???cause i dont know how to use it....
all hints are welcome....

another question is about starting a guild......i would really like to start
a necromancer guild on bristlebane, but its damn hard to find ten necros
there..so all voulanteers are welcome....its gona be a dark..real dark necro
guild with all the advantages and disadvantages a necro live brings.....

i hope ill get some response of my dark friends.....

Agedon, lvl 15 necromancer of the shiny city of AKKON....

"the path of the dark is covered by lots of fallen

by their feet, they dont

make them stumble, just smile....about their deeds"
